title: If a face-down Defense Position Hi-Speedroid Chanbara on my side of the field is attacked by an opponent's monster, can its effect that makes it gain 200 ATK be activated?
question: If a face-down Defense Position Hi-Speedroid Chanbara on my side of the field is attacked by an opponent's monster, can its effect that makes it gain 200 ATK be activated?
answer: The effect of Hi-Speedroid Chanbara activates at the start of the Damage Step. (This effect activates before a face-down Defense Position monster is flipped face-up.) Therefore, in this scenario, if a face-down Defense Position Hi-Speedroid Chanbara is attacked by an opponent's monster, Hi-Speedroid Chanbara is not face-up at the start of the Damage Step so its effect cannot be activated.
llm_answer: No. Hi-Speedroid Chanbara's effect to gain 200 ATK cannot be activated when it is face-down because its effect requires it to be face-up on the field.
